body:
Thank you for the readEPResult component that reads and formats results for you!

I am using a List Item component to compile results since I noticed the header is always 6 lines long, so I can extract the results for each system by listing out the 7th value. It works for all end uses except fanElectric which seems to not order the data correctly. Any thoughts?

replies.body:
That fan ordering is a bug.  Upload the GH file here and I will fix it.



On a side-note, I would recommend using the "Ladybug_Separate Data" component to separate text strings from numbers in any data that has a Ladybug header on it.



-Chris
